name: Indie Hackers Cape Town
description: Indie Hackers is a community of makers working together to build profitable online businesses. Learn from fellow makers and connect with others who are starting and growing their own companies in Cape Town.

name: Tech Leadership
description:
We aim to create an open community of people managers and technology leaders to exchange regularly about managing teams, solving difficult organisational topics, 
        discovering new ways of working with the people we are allowed to mentor and all other aspects.

name: DataConf
Description: DataConf targets professionals who work in any area of the data ecosystem, across various different industries. The range of topics aims to attract various levels of experience and roles.

Description.name: PyconZA
Description.description: PyConZA is the annual gathering of the South African community using and developing the open-source Python programming language.

Description.name: ServerlessDays Cape Town
Description.description: ServerlessDays are a family of events around the world focused on fostering a community around serverless technologies.
